title: Smart Data Models - AccumulatorValue
description: Adapted from CIM data models. AccumulatorValue represents an accumulated (counted) MeasurementValue.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be AccumulatorValue

Accumulator.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The values connected to this measurement. Default: None

AccumulatorReset.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The command that reset the accumulator value. Default: None

value.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The value to supervise. The value is positive. Default: 0
